title: Travelling waves in a dispersion-saturating diffusion equation
authors:
Gnord Maypaokha, Nabil Bedjaoui, Joaquim M. C. Correia, Michael
  Grinfeld
abstract:
In the framework of hyperbolic conservation laws regularised by including
diffusive and dispersive terms, we study monotone travelling waves for the
generalised Rosenau-Korteweg de Vries equation. We establish existence as well
as linear and nonlinear determinacy results in different regimes.
